BC-BCHRT-1.1.name: BCHRT Form 1.1 — Human Rights Complaint (Individual)
BC-BCHRT-1.1.description: File a human rights complaint for an individual

BC-BCHRT-1.2.name: BCHRT Form 1.2 — Authorization to File for Another Person
BC-BCHRT-1.2.description: Authorization to file a complaint on behalf of another person

BC-BCHRT-1.3.name: BCHRT Form 1.3 — Complaint for Group or Class
BC-BCHRT-1.3.description: File a human rights complaint for a group or class of people

BC-BCHRT-2.name: BCHRT Form 2 — Complaint Response
BC-BCHRT-2.description: Respond to a human rights complaint

BC-BCHRT-3.name: BCHRT Form 3 — Amendment Form
BC-BCHRT-3.description: Change or amend a complaint or complaint response

BC-BCHRT-6.name: BCHRT Form 6 — Complaint Withdrawal
BC-BCHRT-6.description: Withdraw all or part of your complaint

BC-BCHRT-7.1.name: BCHRT Form 7.1 — General Application
BC-BCHRT-7.1.description: Apply to the Tribunal about a complaint already filed

BC-BCHRT-8.name: BCHRT Form 8 — Order to Attend Hearing
BC-BCHRT-8.description: Obtain an order for a witness to attend hearing

BC-BCHRT-9.1.name: BCHRT Form 9.1 — Complainant Document Disclosure
BC-BCHRT-9.1.description: Complainant lists and shares documents relating to the complaint

BC-BCHRT-9.2.name: BCHRT Form 9.2 — Respondent Document Disclosure
BC-BCHRT-9.2.description: Respondent lists and shares documents relating to the complaint

BC-BCHRT-10.name: BCHRT Form 10 — Request for Accommodation
BC-BCHRT-10.description: Request accommodation for disability or other needs

BC-RTB-DISPUTE.name: BC RTB — Application for Dispute Resolution
BC-RTB-DISPUTE.description: Apply for dispute resolution with the BC Residential Tenancy Branch
